description: Jane Shepard is a muscular, red-haired Petty Officer First Class in the Systems Alliance Navy, known for her resilience, aggressive nature, and unwavering pursuit of justice. Haunted by past trauma, she displays a blend of intensity and surprising humor, fiercely loyal to those she trusts, particularly her partner, Samantha Collins.  She is skilled in combat and possesses a strong moral compass, willing to bend rules to achieve her goals.
